Title: Psycho
Description: A secretary embezzles money and checks into a secluded motel run by a disturbed innkeeper, setting off a chain of events that lead to suspense, terror, and a shocking revelation.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
Description: 'Raiders of the Lost Ark' is a classic adventure film directed by Steven Spielberg and released in 1981. It follows the iconic archaeologist Indiana Jones as he embarks on a perilous quest to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can harness its power for world domination, blending action-packed sequences, memorable characters, and a gripping storyline in an unforgettable cinematic experience.

Title: Star Wars: A New Hope
Description: In a galaxy far, far away, a young farm boy, a princess, and a smuggler join forces to combat the evil Galactic Empire.

Title: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial
Description: A young boy befriends an alien stranded on Earth and helps him return home while evading government agents.

Title: Jurassic Park
Description: A billionaire invites a group of experts to tour a dinosaur park, but their visit turns into a fight for survival when the cloned dinosaurs escape.

Title: The Godfather
Description: The patriarch of an organized crime dynasty passes control to his reluctant son, who must navigate the dangerous world of the mafia.

Title: The Birds
Description: In the quiet coastal town of Bodega Bay, strange and violent bird attacks begin to occur, leading to a terrifying battle for survival as the townspeople face a relentless and inexplicable avian threat.

Title: Inception
Description: A thief with the ability to enter people's dreams is tasked with planting an idea in someone's mind, but he must navigate a world of shifting realities.

Title: The Dark Knight
Description: A brooding superhero battles a chaotic criminal mastermind known as the Joker, who seeks to plunge Gotham City into anarchy.

Title: Titanic
Description: A fictionalized account of the ill-fated maiden voyage of the RMS Titanic, a luxury ocean liner that strikes an iceberg and sinks, leading to a tragic love story between two passengers.
